DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , double-blind study evaluate exploratory biomarkers safety tolerability single dose RO5028442 adult male high-functioning autistic patient . In cross-over design , patient randomize receive either single dose RO5028442 match placebo washout period 7-14 day . Anticipated time study approximately 9 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study RO5028442 Adult Male High-Functioning Autistic Patients
